ISPInterface.FuseWarning: 1,0x40,0x40,WARNING! These fuse settings will disable the JTAG interface!
1,0x20,0x20,WARNING! These fuse settings will disable the ISP interface!

HVInterface.FuseWarning: 1,0x40,0x40,WARNING! These fuse settings will disable the JTAG interface!
1,0x20,0x20,WARNING! These fuse settings will disable the ISP interface!

JTAGInterface.FuseWarning: 1,0x40,0x40,WARNING! These fuse settings will disable the JTAG interface!
1,0x20,0x20,WARNING! These fuse settings will disable the ISP interface!

LOCKBIT.TEXT: [LB1 = 1 : LB2 = 1] No memory lock features enabled. [LB1 = 0 : LB2 = 1] Further programming of Flash and EEPROM is enabled. [LB1 = 0 : LB2 = 0] Same as previous, but verify is also disabled

TEXT1.TEXT: Mode 1: No memory lock features enabled

TEXT3.TEXT: Mode 3: Further programming and verification disabled

TEXT4.TEXT: Application Protection Mode 1: No lock on SPM and LPM in Application Section

TEXT5.TEXT: Application Protection Mode 2: SPM prohibited in Application Section

TEXT6.TEXT: Application Protection Mode 3: LPM and SPM prohibited in Application Section

TEXT7.TEXT: Application Protection Mode 4: LPM prohibited in Application Section

TEXT8.TEXT: Boot Loader Protection Mode 1: No lock on SPM and LPM in Boot Loader Section

TEXT9.TEXT: Boot Loader Protection Mode 2: SPM prohibited in Boot Loader Section

TEXT10.TEXT: Boot Loader Protection Mode 3: LPM and SPM prohibited in Boot Loader Section

TEXT11.TEXT: Boot Loader Protection Mode 4: LPM prohibited in Boot Loader Section

TEXT1.TEXT: Brown-out detection level at VCC=4.0 V; [BODLEVEL=0]

TEXT2.TEXT: Brown-out detection level at VCC=2.7 V; [BODLEVEL=1]

FUSE5.NAME: SPIEN
FUSE5.TEXT: Enable Serial programming and Data Downloading

FUSE3.NAME: EESAVE
FUSE3.TEXT: EEPROM memory is preserved through chip erase

TEXT4.TEXT: Preserve EEPROM memory through the Chip Erase cycle; [EESAVE=0]

TEXT5.TEXT: Boot Flash section size=128 words Boot start address=$1F80; [BOOTSZ=11]

TEXT6.TEXT: Boot Flash section size=256 words Boot start address=$1F00; [BOOTSZ=10]

TEXT7.TEXT: Boot Flash section size=512 words Boot start address=$1E00; [BOOTSZ=01]

TEXT8.TEXT: Boot Flash section size=1024 words Boot start address=$1C00; [BOOTSZ=00] ; default value

TEXT10.TEXT: CKOPT fuse (operation dependent of CKSEL fuses); [CKOPT=0]

LOCKBIT.TEXT: 无加密(没有使能存储器保护特性)[LB2=1 LB1=1]

TEXT1.TEXT: 无加密(没有使能存储器保护特性)[LB2=1 LB1=1]

TEXT2.TEXT: 禁止进一步对Flash 和EEPROM 编程[LB2=1 LB1=0]

TEXT3.TEXT: 禁止进一步对Flash 和EEPROM 编程及验证[LB2=0 LB1=0]

TEXT4.TEXT: SPM 和LPM 对应用区的访问没有限制[BLB02=1 BLB01=1]

TEXT5.TEXT: 不允许SPM 对应用区进行写操作[BLB02=1 BLB01=0]

TEXT6.TEXT: 不允许SPM 指令对应用区进行写操作，也不允许运行于Boot Loader区的LPM指令从应用区读取数据。[BLB02=0 BLB01=0]

TEXT7.TEXT: 不允许运行于Boot Loader区的LPM 指令从应用区读取数据[BLB02=0 BLB01=1]

TEXT8.TEXT: 允许SPM/LPM 指令访问Boot Loader区[BLB12=1 BLB11=1]

TEXT9.TEXT: 不允许SPM 指令对Boot Loader区进行写操作[BLB12=1 BLB11=0]

TEXT10.TEXT: 不允许SPM 指令对Boot Loader区进行写操作，也不允许运行于应用区的LPM 指令从Boot Loader区读取数据[BLB12=0 BLB11=0]

TEXT11.TEXT: 不允许运行于应用区的LPM 指令从Boot Loader区读取数据 [BLB12=0 BLB11=1]

FUSE5.NAME: SPIEN
FUSE5.TEXT: Enable Serial programming and Data Downloading

FUSE3.NAME: EESAVE
FUSE3.TEXT: EEPROM memory is preserved through chip erase

TEXT4.TEXT: 执行芯片擦除时保留EEPROM的内容[EESAVE=0]

TEXT5.TEXT: Boot区大小( 256 Words); Boot区起始地址(0X3F00)[BOOTSZ=11]

TEXT6.TEXT: Boot区大小( 512 Words); Boot区起始地址(0X3E00)[BOOTSZ=10]

TEXT7.TEXT: Boot区大小(1024 Words); Boot区起始地址(0X3C00)[BOOTSZ=01]

TEXT8.TEXT: Boot区大小(2048 Words); Boot区起始地址(0X3800)[BOOTSZ=00]

TEXT9.TEXT: 将复位向量移至Boot区起始地址(默认地址=0X0000)[BOOTRST=0]

TEXT10.TEXT: 使能CKOPT(振荡器在输出引脚(X2)产生满幅度的振荡)[CKOPT=0]
